title: Behavior of a function based on its derivatives

content.prompt: At which of the five points on the graph in the figure at the right are dy dx MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3A2F@ and d 2 y d x 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3C49@ both negative?

topic.text: 5.9: Connecting a Function, Its First Derivative, and Its Second Derivative

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Identify how mathematical characteristics or properties of functions are related in different representations.
